verses.verse: So these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8800><s%> I-yov <S%H347><s%>, because he was righteous <S%H6662><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Then was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite <S%H940><s%>, of the kindred <S%H4940><s%> of Ram <S%H7410><s%>: against I-yov <S%H347><s%> was his wrath <S%H639><s%> kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, because he justified <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8763><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> rather than 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Also against his three <S%H7969><s%> friends <S%H7453><s%> was his wrath <S%H639><s%> kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, because they had found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no answer <S%H4617><s%>, and yet had condemned <S%H7561><s%> <S%H8686><s%> I-yov <S%H347><s%>.
Now Elihu <S%H453><s%> had waited <S%H2442><s%> <S%H8765><s%> till I-yov <S%H347><s%> had spoken <S%H1697><s%>, because they were elder <S%H2205><s%> <S%H3117><s%> than he.

When Elihu <S%H453><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that there was no answer <S%H4617><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, then his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite <S%H940><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am young <S%H6810><s%> <S%H3117><s%>, and ye are very old <S%H3453><s%>; wherefore I was afraid <S%H2119><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and durst <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not shew <S%H2331><s%> <S%H8763><s%> you mine opinion <S%H1843><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Days <S%H3117><s%> should speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and multitude <S%H7230><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> should teach <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
But <S%H403><s%> there is a spirit <S%H7307><s%> in man <S%H582><s%>: and the inspiration <S%H5397><s%> of 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%> giveth them understanding <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Great men <S%H7227><s%> are not always wise <S%H2449><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: neither do the aged <S%H2205><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
Therefore I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to me; I also will shew <S%H2331><s%> <S%H8762><s%> mine opinion <S%H1843><s%>.

Behold, I waited <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for your words <S%H1697><s%>; I gave ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to your reasons <S%H8394><s%>, whilst ye searched out <S%H2713><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what to say <S%H4405><s%>.

Yea, I attended <S%H995><s%> <S%H8709><s%> unto you, and, behold, there was none of you that convinced <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8688><s%> I-yov <S%H347><s%>, or that answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his words <S%H561><s%>:

Lest ye should say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We have found out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> thrusteth him down <S%H5086><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, not man <S%H376><s%>.
Now he hath not directed <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his words <S%H4405><s%> against me: neither will I answer <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him with your speeches <S%H561><s%>.
They were amazed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, they answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no more: they left off <S%H6275><s%> <S%H8689><s%> speaking <S%H4405><s%>.
When I had waited <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, (for they spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> not, but stood still <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no more;)
I said, I will answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also my part <S%H2506><s%>, I also will shew <S%H2331><s%> <S%H8762><s%> mine opinion <S%H1843><s%>.
For I am full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of matter <S%H4405><s%>, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H990><s%> me constraineth <S%H6693><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me.
Behold, my belly <S%H990><s%> is as wine <S%H3196><s%> which hath no vent <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; it is ready to burst <S%H1234><s%> <S%H8735><s%> like new <S%H2319><s%> bottles <S%H178><s%>.
I will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, that I may be refreshed <S%H7304><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: I will open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> and answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Let me not, I pray you, accept <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any man's <S%H376><s%> person <S%H6440><s%>, neither let me give flattering titles <S%H3655><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto man <S%H120><s%>.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not to give flattering titles <S%H3655><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; in so doing my maker <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> would soon <S%H4592><s%> take me away <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
